abstract: Suspension of Pittsburgh Steelers running back Le’Veon Bell is reduced from three games to two.
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh running back was barred from the first three games of the season after being arrested on drunken-driving and drug charges last year, but the N.F.L. cut it to two games.

headline.main: Steeler Le’Veon Bell’s Ban Is Reduced

snippet: The Pittsburgh running back was barred from the first three games of the season after being arrested on drunken-driving and drug charges last year, but the N.F.L. cut it to two games.
